    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.xlattice.Acceptor getAcceptor(org.xlattice.Address nearAddr, boolean blocking)
      The address passed is a private TLS serverAddress, which includes the server private key materials, directly or indirectly.
      org.xlattice.Connection getConnection(org.xlattice.Address nearAddr, org.xlattice.Address farAddr, boolean blocking)
      Both of the addresses are public TLS addresses, one a client address and the other a server address.
      org.xlattice.Connector getConnector(org.xlattice.Address farAddr, boolean blocking)
      The far end is specified here, the near end in the connect() call.
      Tcp getTcp() 
      java.lang.String name()
      We might want to call this "tls/tcp".

                                      throws java.io.IOException

        farAddr - the server address

      • getConnector

        public org.xlattice.Connector getConnector(org.xlattice.Address farAddr,
                                  boolean blocking)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        The far end is specified here, the near end in the connect() call. The address passed is a public TLS server address, which contains, directly or indirectly, the server's public key.
        Specified by:
        getConnector in interface ClientServer
        Parameters:
        farAddr - address of the remote Acceptor
        blocking - whether this Connector is itself blocking
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
